article.title: Patriots release LB Thomas
article.body:
The New England Patriots on Monday released unhappy linebacker Adalius Thomas, the Boston Globe reported.

Thomas spent three seasons with the Patriots and occasionally clashed with cach Bill Belichick over how he was used.

After collecting 11 sacks in his final season with Baltimore in 2006, he had 14 in three years with the Patriots, including a career-low three last season.
